attributes.action: A Review of the Children Leaving Care Act 2000 to be Carried out by a Care Leaver (Former Relavent Child)
attributes.additional_details:
I petition that the goverment allow a review of the children leaving care act 2000 to be carried out by a care leaver (former relavant child) on the basis that this legisaltion directly affects the quality of life for care leavers in england and only the care leavers them selfs really know how bad it is. and what needs to change. and that the government accepts its findings and right a new version of the children leaving care act accordingly

Please enable me a care leaver that has a heart felt reason for change after seeing what the system does to these young people. to make change and change there lives for the better

if you would like to help my cause please sign my pertition
